p:
The active site amino acid residues of AChE and BuChE were retrieved from the literature.
27, 28 Molecular docking was performed using AutoDock 4.2. Autogrid was utilized to prepare the grid maps using a grid box size of 50 × 50 × 50 xyz points and the active site of AChE (x = 20.823, y = 16.078, and z = 18.939) and BuChE (x = 137.156, y = 113.437, z = 43.769). The Lamarckian genetic algorithm and the pseudo-Solis and Wets methods were applied for minimization, using default parameters.
